description: From handy +‎ -ly. Compare Middle English hendily, hendiliche.

adverbs.description: handily (comparative more handily, superlative most handily)

entries.meaning: (chiefly US) In a handy manner; skillfully; conveniently.
examples: As the mysteries of valetism are not very recondite or difficult to be acquired by an intelligent person, Lockwood, after a little practice, performed his functions handily enough;  […]
